hero.title: Caring for your <1>vision</1> with excellence
hero.subtitle: At Saraiva Vision, we combine cutting-edge technology with humanized care to offer the best in eye health. Your vision is our priority.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a full range of ophthalmological services to care for your vision with the highest quality and technology.

consultations.title: Ophthalmological Consultations
consultations.description: Complete assessment of your eye health, with accurate diagnosis and treatment.

refraction.title: Refraction Exams
refraction.description: High-precision determination of prescription for glasses and contact lenses.

specialized.title: Specialized Treatments
specialized.description: Treatment for glaucoma, cataracts, retinal diseases, and other eye conditions.

surgeries.title: Ophthalmological Surgeries
surgeries.description: Advanced surgical procedures to correct vision problems.

pediatric.title: Pediatric Follow-up
pediatric.description: Specialized care for children's eye health, from birth.

reports.title: Specialized Reports
reports.description: Issuance of ophthalmological reports for exams, expert opinions, and other purposes.

contactLenses.title: Specialized in Contact Lenses
contactLenses.description: We offer a complete solution for contact lens users, from prescription to personalized adaptation.
contactLenses.adaptation: We carry out the lens adaptation process safely and personally, ensuring comfort and eye health.
contactLenses.brands: We work with soft and rigid gas permeable lenses from Sólotica, as well as soft lenses from Bioview.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We are available to answer your questions and schedule your appointment. Your vision is our priority.
contact.chatbot_desc: Get instant answers to common questions about our services and scheduling.

homeMeta.title: Saraiva Vision Clinic - Excellence in Ophthalmology
homeMeta.description: Leading ophthalmology clinic in Caratinga. We offer consultations, exams, and surgeries with advanced technology and humanized care. Schedule your appointment!
homeMeta.keywords: ophthalmologist, ophthalmology clinic, eye health, eye exams, eye surgery, ophthalmology, Caratinga

serviceMeta.title: {{serviceTitle}} | Saraiva Vision Clinic
serviceMeta.description: Learn more about {{serviceTitleLowercase}} at Saraiva Vision. We offer advanced treatments and diagnoses for your eye health.

faqMeta.title: FAQ | Saraiva Vision Clinic
faqMeta.description: Answers to common questions about eye consultations, exams, surgeries and contact lenses.
faqMeta.keywords: ophthalmology faq, eye exam questions, eye clinic faq, contact lens questions

lensesMeta.title: Contact Lenses | Safe Adaptation | Saraiva Vision
lensesMeta.description: Types, adaptation guidance and care best practices for safe contact lens use.
lensesMeta.keywords: contact lenses adaptation, contact lens care, eye clinic lenses

serviceDetail.cta_title: Ready to Take Care of Your Vision?
serviceDetail.cta_desc: Contact us to schedule your appointment or ask your questions. We are ready to assist you!

consultas-oftalmologicas.title: Complete Ophthalmological Consultations
consultas-oftalmologicas.description: Our consultations include a detailed assessment of your eye health, identifying and treating various conditions to ensure the best possible vision.

details.title: Comprehensive Evaluation
details.text: Complete eye exam, intraocular pressure, and fundus examination.

details.title: Accurate Diagnosis
details.text: Early identification of diseases such as glaucoma, cataracts, and retinopathies.

details.title: Personalized Treatment Plan
details.text: Recommendations and treatments tailored to your needs.

exames-de-refracao.title: Refraction Exams and Glasses Prescription
exames-de-refracao.description: We perform precise refraction exams to determine the exact prescription for your glasses or contact lenses, ensuring clear and comfortable vision.

details.title: Precision in Diagnosis
details.text: We use modern equipment for an accurate measurement of your prescription.

details.title: Visual Comfort
details.text: Personalized prescription for glasses and lenses that adapt to your lifestyle.

details.title: Continuous Monitoring
details.text: Periodic re-evaluations to ensure the health and comfort of your vision.

tratamentos-especializados.title: Specialized Treatments for Eye Diseases
tratamentos-especializados.description: We offer advanced treatments for a wide range of eye diseases, from common conditions to the most complex, focusing on the recovery and maintenance of your vision.

details.title: Glaucoma
details.text: Clinical and surgical management to control intraocular pressure and preserve the optic nerve.

details.title: Cataract
details.text: Diagnosis and surgical indication for restoring lens transparency.

details.title: Retinopathies
details.text: Treatments for retinal diseases, including diabetic retinopathy and macular degeneration.

cirurgias-oftalmologicas.title: Advanced Ophthalmological Surgeries
cirurgias-oftalmologicas.description: Our team performs ophthalmological surgeries using the most modern and safest techniques, aiming to restore your vision and improve your quality of life.

details.title: Cataract Surgery
details.text: Quick and safe procedure to remove cataracts and implant intraocular lenses.

details.title: Refractive Surgery (LASIK/PRK)
details.text: Correction of myopia, hyperopia, and astigmatism to reduce or eliminate dependence on glasses.

details.title: Glaucoma Surgeries
details.text: Interventions to control eye pressure and prevent disease progression.

acompanhamento-pediatrico.title: Pediatric Ophthalmological Follow-up
acompanhamento-pediatrico.description: We take special care of children's eye health, diagnosing and treating visual problems early to ensure healthy development.

details.title: Playful Exams
details.text: Child-friendly approach, making the exam a positive experience.

details.title: Early Detection
details.text: Identification of strabismus, amblyopia, and refractive errors at an early age.

details.title: Personalized Treatment
details.text: Treatment plans adapted to each child's needs.

laudos-especializados.title: Specialized Reports and Opinions
laudos-especializados.description: We offer detailed ophthalmological reports and opinions for various purposes, such as public tenders, expert appraisals, and occupational health assessments.

details.title: Complete Documentation
details.text: Detailed and accurate reports to meet legal and professional requirements.

details.title: Professional Evaluation
details.text: Opinions issued by experienced and qualified ophthalmologists.

details.title: Timely Delivery
details.text: Commitment to deadlines so you have your documents in a timely manner.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This policy explains how we process your personal data under the Brazilian LGPD (Law 13.709/2018).
privacy.data_item_contact: Contact data submitted via forms (name, email, phone).
privacy.data_item_cookies: Consent preferences and functional/analytics/marketing cookies (only if authorized).
privacy.purposes_desc: Customer support, scheduling, service improvement, aggregate metrics, and legitimate communications.
privacy.rights_desc: You may request access, correction, anonymization, portability, consent revocation and deletion: contact the DPO.
privacy.consent_desc: We process data based on your explicit consent when required. You can revoke anytime via 'Manage Cookies'.
privacy.dpo_desc: For rights requests or privacy questions email {{email}}.
privacy.security_desc: We apply reasonable technical and organizational controls (in‑transit encryption, access restriction).
privacy.retention_desc: We retain data only as long as needed for stated purposes or legal obligations, then delete or anonymize.
privacy.third_parties_desc: Hosting, analytics and communication providers – only as per disclosed purposes & legal bases.
privacy.updates_desc: We may update this policy; the revision date will always be shown.
privacy.form_consent_html: I agree with the processing of my data for contact and scheduling.
privacy.disclaimer: Information provided does not replace individual medical evaluation.

cfm.disclaimer: Informational content without promise of outcomes. Consult the responsible physician for personalized assessment.
